text: @JoeBiden Please help my family Donald Trump❤ my husband is an American citizen and disabled, he gets no help from America! He is disabled from having a stroke putting a criminal in jail for hurting our daughter! Now we have lost everything from the coronavirus killing my business. Help🙏
